features: ORALPHI FEATHER SOFT TOOTHBRUSH: With more than 10,000 ultra soft bristles, our toothbrush feels like feather, effectively clean your teeth without damaging the enamel, is specially designed for sensitive teeth, bleeding gum, receding gums.
WIDE BRUSH HEAD: The 0.6 inch wide brush head can brush two rows of your teeth at one time, which makes your brushing is much easier.

EASY TO DRY: The 2021 new generation design of 21 square hole with gaps between bristles, enable bristles to ventilate and dry out much faster than the foam sponge-like bristles and prevent something get trapped at the root.

MICRO NANO BRISTLES: The 0.12mm micro nano bristles which are BPA-free gently massage your gum. The extra soft tapered bristle tips measured 0.08mm in diameter, effectively reach between teeth and remove maximum plaque.
EASY TO GRIP: Comfortable grip toothbrush handle provides comfort and control while brushing.
ANGLED TOOTHBRUSH: Helps reach the insides of your teeth, especially the insides of your lower and upper front teeth.
Premium PBT Bristles: Oralphi Feather Soft Toothbrushes are made from premium food grade PBT bristles, more durable and less water-absorbent.
PACKAGE INCLUDED: Comes with 6 toothbrushes (colors may vary), family pack perfectly for adults, pregnant women, and elderly.

Dentist recommened replacing your toothbrush as soon as the bristles begin to look worn or frayed (usually every three months). If you are not absolutely 100% satisfied with our toothbrush, please let us know right away! We'll provide the best possible solution for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Feather Soft Bristles With more than 10,000 feather soft bristle, our toothbrush feels like feather, effectively clean your teeth without damaging the enamel, is specially designed for sensitive teeth, bleeding gum, receding gums, pregnant women. Wider Brush Head The 0.6 inch wide brush head greatly increase the cleaning area, can brush 2 rows of teeth at one time, makes your brushing much easier. Easy to Dry The 2021 new design of 21 square hole with gaps between bristles, provide enough space between bristles to ventilate and dry easily, effectively keep cleaning for your toothbrush.

Micro Nano Bristles The 0.12mm micro nano bristles which are BPA-free, can gently massage your gum. The bristle tips measured 0.08mm in diameter, effectively reach between teeth and remove maximum plaque. Easy to Grip Comfortable grip toothbrush handle provides comfort and control while brushing. Angled Toothbrush Angle Toothbrush Design helps reach the insides of your teeth, especially the insides of your lower and upper front teeth. Package Included Package include 6 Oralphi Feather Soft Toothbrushes (Colors may Vary). Family pack perfectly for adults, kids, pregnant women, and elderly. Micro Nano Bristles Easy to Grip Angled Toothbrush Package Included

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than any other brush out there!
reviews.reviewText: I have Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome type 3 and other health issues. With the Ehlers-Danlos, our connective tissues are very fragile. This toothbrush is AMAZING! The handles are longer making the grip much better, the compact and soft but super cleansing bristles will NOT break your skin and leave your teeth really clean! No bleeding gums at all! I've used expensive brushes and they hurt and were like spikes on my gums no matter how soft making me bleed extensively. Whatever you do, please don't stop making them. You should market these to the Ehlers-Danlos Society and let others with my genetic disorder get help as well. I will stand behind this product 100% and I would let you use my name and testimony if you ever needed. I have well documented dr info regarding the Ehlers-Danlos and other issues. So I'm legit! I can't say enough good things about your toothbrushes!!! I will NEVER need another and have thrown away every other I have. You're a Godsend! Blessings and gratitude for your product 🙏 ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle Yet Very Effective Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Having sensitive teeth due to medical treatments I have had to be extra careful to not brush my teeth or gums to hard yet still get my teeth clean. This gentle, feather soft toothbrush has helped tremendously to accomplish just that. My daughter initially found these toothbrushes for me and now are the only ones I buy. Amazon has the best price and you get multiple brushes in the pack. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toothbrush for sensitive teeth/gums
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive teeth and gums. This toothbrush is very soft as to not cause pain while brushing but it does give my teeth a thorough cleaning. I like the shape of the head and the handle is very easy to hold onto. I highly recommend this toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bristles feels fluffy!
reviews.reviewText: I like this toothbrush as it is super soft. I feel that it cleans my gums very well and able to get to little gaps between the teeth. I also like that it has a broad surface with compact bristles, being able to brush a bigger area.One minor drawback with this toothbrush is with the plastic stick. It is thick but fragile at the same time, one of the tooth brush broke in the middle whilst brushing…which I never encountered before with any brand.Overall, if the stick is sturdier and solid, I would recommend this tooth brush as I really like the design and quality of the bristles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrush ever!
reviews.reviewText: Soft! Perfect if you brush too hard.Very comfortable!Feels very fresh and clean after use.I'll never go back to other brushes.Upgrade your oral health, get these!Great to teach kids to brush properly too.Really good on the gums.Floss daily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft bristles and wide head. These seem really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Toothbrush Ever!
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is very durable yet gentle on both the teeth and gums. The softness of the brushes is perfect. I have had some bleeding of the gums with other soft toothbrushes, but never had bleeding with the Oralphi toothbrush. The densness of the brushes also make this toothbrush last forever.Most toothbrushes only last for several months. The Oralphi has lasted me over 6 months and still going. It's truly an amazing toothbrush!I have finally found the brand of toothbrush that is the only one that I will use for the rest of my life and my wife agrees that she will never have to look for another toothbrush again.My oral hygienist always comments on how clean my teeth are and makes her job very easy. I told her about this toothbrush and she will most likely recommend it to her other patients as well. A+++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the brush; it is thick wide and very soft and easy on gums. However, during brushing the bristles are shedding every time I brush. Now to be clear the bristles are shedding by 1-3 at a time , but this is not good because they can get stuck between teeth. So, I will keep these and use them up, but I will not buy again.
This is a good item, size of bristles is great, but I’d definitely say the disappointment is in the bristles themselves as are soft, not super soft or ultra soft
